text: Elaeocarpus amoenus is a species of flowering plant in the Elaeocarpaceae family used as a medicinal plant. It is endemic to Sri Lanka, where they called "Thiththa weralu – තිත්ත වෙරළු" by local people.India biodiversity ==References== ==External links== * jstor.org amoenus Category:Endemic flora of Sri Lanka
title: Elaeocarpus amoenus
